NOTICE OF CONSTABLE'S SALE By virtue of a certain Writ of Execution issued by the County Court at Law Two of Tarrant County, Texas on the 5th day of May 2025, in a certain cause numbered 2011-003575-2 styled Pharia LLC vs Dana Brackeen. I, Deputy Chris Woodrum for Joe Harris Jr. Constable for Precinct Two of Parker County Texas, on the 5th day of June 2025 at 3:04 P.M have levied upon and will on the 1st day of July 2025 at 10:00am, at the Parker County District Courthouse Door, 117 Fort Worth Highway, in the city of Weatherford, Texas that being the location as designated by the County Commissioners, within legal hours, proceed to sell for cash to the highest bidder, all of the right, title, and interest the Defendant(s) held on the date of levy, if any, or at anytime thereafter, in and all to the following described property, levied upon as the property subject to the Writ of Execution to wit: Legal: Acres: 8.770, Abst: 2080, Survey: WHITE GEORGE S Situs: WHITE SETTLEMENT 4525 Legal: Acres: 1.000, Abst: 2080, Survey: WHITE GEORGE S Situs: WHITE SETTLEMENT 4525 Legal: Acres: 1.800, Abst: 2080, Survey: WHITE GEORGE S Situs: WHITE SETTLEMENT 4525 The above sale to be made by me to satisfy or partially satisfy the above described judgment in favor of the Plaintiff, together with the costs of said suit and the proceeds applied to the satisfaction or partial satisfaction thereof. Texas Rules of Civil Procedure 643 Goods and chattels pledged or mortgaged as security for any debt or contract may be levied upon and sold on execution against the person making the pledge, assignment or mortgage subject thereto; and the purchaser shall be entitled to the possession when it is held by the pledgee, assignee or mortgagee, on complying with the conditions of the pledge, assignment or mortgage. THE PROPERTY IS SOLD AS IS, WHERE IS, AND WITHOUT ANY WARRANTY, EITHER EXPRESS OR IMPLIED. THE CONSTABLE'S OFFICE DOES NOT WARRANT OR MAKE ANY REPRESENTATION ABOUT THE PROPERTY'S TITLE, CONDITION, HABITABILITY, MERCHANTABILITY, OR FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE. BUYERS ASSUME ALL RISKS. A POTENTIAL BUYER WHO WOULD LIKE MORE INFORMATION SHOULD MAKE ADDITIONAL INQUIRIES OR CONSULT WITH PRIVATE COUNSEL. ALL SALES SUBJECT TO CANCELLATION WITHOUT PRIOR NOTICE. THERE MAY BE ADDITIONAL FEES DUE ON THE DATE OF SALE WHICH HAVE BEEN ASSESED SINCE THE DATE OF PUBLICATION. Sincerely, Chris Woodrum, Deputy for Joe Harris Jr. Constable Pct. PUBLIC NOTICE Pursuant to Chapter 59, Texas Property Code, Storage of Weatherford located at 445 Ric Williamson Memorial Hwy, Weatherford, TX 76088 will hold a public auction of property being sold to satisfy landlord's lien. Sale will be held online at www.iBid4Storage.com. The online auction will start on Jun. 20, 2025, at 9:00 am and end on Jun. 27, 2025, at 1:00 pm. Registering online is free; all payments are paid to Storage of Weatherford. Any questions concerning the auction, please contact Storage of Weatherford. Property will be sold to the highest bidder for cash. Deposit for removal and clean-up will be required. Seller reserves the right not to accept any bid and withdraw property from sale. NOTICE OF PUBLIC HEARING Notice is hereby given that a public hearing will be held on behalf of Maypearl Cultural Education Facilities Finance Corporation (the â€œCorporationâ€), a nonprofit corporation, on June 16, 2025, commencing at 10:00 a.m. to provide an opportunity for all interested persons to be heard with respect to a loan (qualified 501(c)(3) bonds as defined in Section 145 of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986, as amended) from Grandview Bank or another financial institution (the â€œLenderâ€) to the Corporation in the maximum aggregate amount of $9,000,000, and a loan from the Corporation to T.B.C.A. Inc. dba Trinity Christian Academy (the â€œBorrowerâ€) in the same amount (collectively, the â€œLoansâ€); all pursuant to a Loan Agreement by and among the Corporation, the Lender and the Borrower. The Loans are being made for the purpose of financing and/or refinancing all or a portion of the costs of the construction of educational facilities and other campus renovations located at 4954 E. Interstate 20 Service Rd. South, Willow Park, Texas 76087 (collectively, the â€œProjectâ€). A portion of the proceeds of the Loans will be used to pay certain expenses in connection with the issuance of the Loans. The Project is or will be owned by the Borrower. The Loans are not payable out of taxes and are secured by and payable solely from funds provided by the Borrower. At the time and place set for the public hearing, interested persons will be given a reasonable opportunity to express their views, both orally (via telephonic participation) and in writing, on the merits of the Project, the Loans or related matters. Members of the public may listen to and contribute to any discussion during the hearing by dialing: 1-346-248-7799, meeting ID: 997 4559 8664, passcode: 306317. Persons wishing to participate should submit a written request to speak to hvu@jw.com at least 24 hours before the hearing; however, the hearing officer will also provide time for additional comments during the hearing. Oral remarks may not exceed five minutes in duration. Written comments may be submitted by email to the President of the Board of Directors of the Corporation c/o Jackson Walker LLP, Attn: Hoang Vu, hvu@jw.com, until the time and date of the hearing. NOTICE OF ORDINANCE ADOPTION T... NOTICE OF ORDINANCE ADOPTION T... NOTICE OF ORDINANCE ADOPTION The Town of Brock, Texas held a Public Hearing on Tuesday, May 27, 2025 whereat the Town Commission approved an ordinance No. amending the adoption of the 2015 International Fire Code and corresponding local amendment specifying when a fire suppression system is required and providing for a penalty not to exceed $2,000 per violation. The Town of Brock, Texas will hold a Public Hearing to consider approval of an ordinance adopting a permit process for the sale of fireworks within the Town of Brock. The hearing will be held on June 16, 2025 at 6:30 at the Brock Community Center, 2115 FM 1189 Brock TX, 76087. All interested persons may appear and be heard. Please contact the Town Clerk via email at townclerk@brocktx.net for additional information. NOTICE TO BIDDERS Invitation to Bid on construction for Parker County, Texas on: PROPOSED ROADWAY CONSTRUCTION FOR KELLY ROAD PAVING IMPROVEMENTS. The work is to include furnishing of all labor, materials, equipment, and performing all work necessary for the construction and other associated improvements detailed in the contract documents and specifications. Bids will be received at 1112 Santa Fe Drive Weatherford, TX 76086 in the Purchasing Department until 2:00 P.M., CDT, June 26, 2025. At that time and place the proposals will be publicly opened and read aloud and retained by the County for tabulation, checking, and evaluation. Bids shall be submitted in ONE of the following ways: 1. HARD COPY: Submit sealed hard copy bids addressed to Mrs. Kim Rivas, Purchasing Agent, Parker County Texas, 1112 Santa Fe Drive Weatherford, TX 76086. Bids shall be submitted upon the blank form of proposal furnished. Sealed bids shall be marked â€œPROPOSED ROADWAY CONSTRUCTION FOR KELLY ROAD PAVING IMPROVEMENTS. DO NOT OPEN UNTIL 2:00 P.M. THURSDAY, JUNE 26, 2025.â€ 2.ELECTRONIC: Bids may also be submitted electronically by visiting the website: https://parkercountytx.bonfirehub.com/portal/?tab=openOpportunities Plans and Contract Documents will be available electronically beginning at 12:00 p.m. on Monday June 9, 2025. Contract Documents, including Drawings and Technical Specifications can be viewed and downloaded without charge at www.parkercountytx.com (under the Bids/RFPs link) or the plans and specifications can be examined without charge in the Parker County Annex office of the Purchasing Agent beginning at 12:00 p.m. on Monday June 9, 2025. Questions are to be submitted using the question and answer process on the procurement website. A non-mandatory pre-bid meeting will be held virtual only. The pre-bid meeting will be held utilizing the Microsoft TEAMS software. A meeting invite will be emailed to all plan holders within 24 hours of the scheduled pre-bid meeting. The Video Conference Meeting ID is 258 001 504 231 3 with a passcode of Wu7HV3Dg and the call in only phone number is 1-469-206-8447 and the Phone Conference ID: 685 214 638#. The pre-bid meeting will be Thursday June 19, 2025 at 2:00 p.m.. A certified check or bank draft, payable to Parker County, negotiable U.S. Government Bonds (at par value), or a satisfactory Bid Bond executed by the Bidder and payable to Parker County in an amount equal to at least five percent (5%) of the total amount of the proposal must accompany each Bid as a guaranty that if the proposal is accepted, the Bidder will execute the contract and furnish the required performance, payment, and maintenance bonds in the amount of one hundred percent (100%) of the contract price. No bids may be withdrawn within sixty (60) days after date on which the bids are opened. In case of ambiguity or lack of clearness in stating proposal prices, the County reserves the right to adopt the proposal that provided for the most advantageous contract and pricing for the County. The contract will be awarded to the lowest responsible bidder; however, the County reserves the right to reject any and all bids. The low bidder shall be prepared to submit such evidence as the County may reasonably require to establish their experience, possession of such equipment, qualification of personnel, and financial responsibility necessary to complete the work on this project in an expeditious, safe, and satisfactory manner. NOTICE TO BIDDERS PUBLIC TRANSIT SERVICES - FACILITY REHABILITATION PROJECT Notice is hereby given that Invitation for Bid for the Transit Facility Rehabilitation Construction project at 7611 Highway 180 East Mineral Wells, Texas 76067. Bid packet will be available on June 6, 2025. Bid responses with all required documentation will be received at the office of Public Transit Services (PTS) 1850 Mineral Wells Highway Weatherford, Texas 76088 (hand-delivered) or PO Box 204 Weatherford, Texas 76087 (US Mail) not later than 2:00 p.m. CST on July 14, 2025. Bid packets will be opened at the PTS offices at 4:00 p.m. (CST) on July 14, 2025, in the PTS Executive Board Room located at 1850 Mineral Wells Highway Weatherford, TX. Bids will be opened publicly, with only the base bid of each contractor to be read aloud. No other information will be disclosed at that time. Public notice of the award of contract or announcement of the decision to award shall be posted under the Procurement link on the PTS website: www.publictransitservices.org Bids and all other documents required to be submitted with the bid shall be enclosed in an envelope and shall be clearly marked â€œPublic Transit Services Transit Facility Rehabilitation Project". The date and time of receipt of bid shall be stamped on the envelope by a transit staff member. Late bids shall not be accepted or opened. PTS reserves the right to reject any and all bids and/or to waive informalities in the bid process. The Invitation for Bid (IFB) and related documents (collectively, the Bid Documents) may be downloaded digitally free of charge in electronic (PDF) format from the PTS website at www.publictransitservices.org. A Pre-Bid Conference (Pre-Bid) Meeting shall be held on June 17, 2025, at 2:00 pm (CST) at the PTS facility located at 7611 Hwy 180 E. Mineral Wells, TX.
